alert.note: Alert for Adams (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 8:02PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND NORTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 802 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stanton, or 13 miles northeast of Natchez, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fayette, Stampley, Red Lick, Stanton, Church Hill, Hamburg, Mcnair, Lorman and Blue Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
